org.deeplearning4j.models.glove

Class AbstractCoOccurrences<T extends SequenceElement>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.models.glove.AbstractCoOccurrences<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class AbstractCoOccurrences<T extends SequenceElement>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class implements building cooccurrence map for abstract training corpus. However it's performance rather low, due to exsessive IO that happens in ShadowCopyThread PLEASE NOTE: Current implementation involves massive IO, and it should be rewritter as soon as ND4j gets sparse arrays support
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
